Name: Argo MOTH
Description:
Manufacturer: Argo Astronautics
Focus: Salvage

Experience Argo's centuries of industrial expertise with the MOTH. Using a tried and tested chassis as its foundation, the MOTH features three dedicated salvage turrets and an external salvage autoloader, so a four person crew can strip, rip, and store salvage as fast as they can get to it.
